description:
At Yuzuru`s suggestion, Tribe Cool Crew decides to hold a cherry blossom viewing party. Yuzuru attaches great importance to this event each year, and this year is no different, as he plans to once again prepare the ultimate culinary experience, the "Cherry Viewing Hundred-Layer Lunch."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Move Mankai! Hana yori Dance Da ze!
ムーブ満開! 花よりダンスだぜ!
